name: Swan Song
notes:
To install the game, click N, N, N, uncheck the box, N, I, uncheck the box, F.

To install the patch, choose Custom Installation, change the installation path to C:\flyingshine\swan_dl and uncheck "Game and temporary files", ignoring the warnings.
content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the DLsite archive
- file2: N/A:Please select the patch installer
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/flyingshine/swan_dl/SWANSONG.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $file1
- task:
    arch: win32
    env:
      LC_ALL: ja_JP.UTF-8
    executable: $CACHE/swan_install.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    executable: $file2
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: wmp9
    arch: win32
    description: Installing Windows Media Player 9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    silent: true
system:
  env:
    LC_ALL: ja_JP.UTF-8
